"Nazun": "Our first quiz today will be a... YES or NO quiz!!"
"The rules are simple! If you think the statement is true, stand in the <c 008b00>Y Area<c>. If you think a statement is false, stand in the <red>N Area<c>."
"Please head to the correct platform! Think carefully, now!"
"Time now for your last question... Voila!"
"This concludes the YES or NO portion of the quiz. Let's make our way to the next quiz area!"
